entry.title: Radiance TAHP-48-8 48" Counter Top 8 Burner Gas Commercial Hotplate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Turbo Air
Type: Hot Plates
Price: 1269.00

Radiance TAHP-48-8 48" Counter Top 8 Burner Gas Commercial Hotplate

  • 2" stainless steel extension legs included
  • (8) 32,000 BTU burners
  • 16 gauge stainless steel front plate and wrap around stainless steel finish except back panel
  • Removable 12" x 12" cast-iron top grates on each burner are designed to allow pot to slide without lifting
  • Grooved top design ensure direct heat to cooking surface
  • Thicker & heavier heavy duty cast -iron provide longer life
  • Easy cleaning, detachable two-piece design burner heads
  • Specially designed burner concentrates flame on center of burner
  • Removable full width grease pan
  • Stainless steel pilots for instant ignition
  • Bull-nose stainless steel front extension provides additional safety to employees from burns
  • Coated inside & outside gas manifold prevent rust and ensure longer life of unit
  • Ergonomically designed heat resistant On-Off knob is made from PPS(Poly Phennylene Sulfide) to provide a cooler, longer life with beautiful chrome finish
  • 48"W x 30"D x 10"H
  • 1 year labor and parts warranty

entry.title: Atosa ACHP-6 Countertop 36" 6 Burner Gas Hot Plate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa Refrigeration
Type: Hot Plates
Price: 983.00

Dimension: 36" Wide X 27-1/2" Deep x 13" Height(Including 4" legs)
# of Burners: 6 Burners independent manual control
BTU: 192,000 Total 
Warranty: 1 Year Parts and Labor Warranty

 

Atosa ACHP-6 36" Countertop 6 burner hot plate will be a perfect addition to any kitchen to cook up some delicious cuisine. The heavy duty stainless steel constructions prolong usage and easy maintenance. The 4" adjustable legs comes standard with every unit. The removable burner and burner grate provide easy cleaning. Best of all, this unit offers the best valve and comes with 1 year worry free parts and labor warranty. 
  • The Next Generation of ruggedly constructed gas griddles, charbroilers, fryers, and plates deliver heavy duty performance.
  • Durable stainless steel structure for corrosion-resistant and easy maintenance.
  • Heavy duty burners with stable flame and stand by pilot 
  • Adjustable 4" Legs
  • Quality products at an exceptional value, that help operators of commercial kitchens and restaurants realize better bottom line results.
  • The unit is the most economical and flexible in the food service industry.
  • Intertek ETL Listed and NSF compliant to North American product safety standards and required sanitation standards.

entry.title: Radiance TAHP-36-6 36"W 6 Burners Gas Hot Plate
entry.summary:
Vendor: Turbo Air
Type: Hot Plates
Price: 1109.00

Turbo Air TAHP-36 Gas Hot Plate 36"W, 6 Burners

  • Stainless steel front, sides and 4” front top ledge
  • Easy cleaning, detachable lift-off 2 piece burner
  • Center concentrated design high performance 32,000 BTU/hr burner
  • Removable 12” x 12” heavy cast-iron top grates
  • Grooved design top grate ensure direct heat to cooking surface
  • Top grate is designed to allow pot to slide without lifting
  • Removable full width grease pan
  • Ergonomically designed heat resistant PPS (Poly Phenylene Sulfide) On-Off knob
  • Adjustable standing pilot for each burner
  • ¾” rear gas connection and gas pressure regulator
  • 2” stainless steel legs included
  • 4” stainless steel legs available as an option
